summary: Retextures of Miraak\'s robes and weapons.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=RED][size=+2]The Miraak\'s Robes and Weapons Retexture[/size][/center][/color]

[size=+1]
[center]Simply a retexture of Miraak\'s robes and weapons.[/center]

Before

[IMG]http://i1273.photobucket.com/albums/y401/Andre7890/ScreenShot137_zpsdde155ac.jpg[/IMG]


After

[IMG]http://i1273.photobucket.com/albums/y401/Andre7890/ScreenShot136_zpsa82bfb1f.jpg[/IMG]


[IMG]http://i1273.photobucket.com/albums/y401/Andre7890/ScreenShot135_zps5fa242e5.jpg[/IMG]


Now you can choose the Black Version as a [u]optional file[/u].

[IMG]http://i1273.photobucket.com/albums/y401/Andre7890/ScreenShot139_zps4b030217.jpg[/IMG]


[center]Now you can download also the weapons![/center]

Staff

[IMG]http://i1273.photobucket.com/albums/y401/Andre7890/ScreenShot148_zps1732cf1f.jpg[/IMG]


Sword

(coming soon)


[center]Install: just drop \"Textures\" folder into \"Textures\" folder in your Skyrim\\Data.[/center]

[center]Please leave a comment if you have any suggest, if you like or if you don\'t like something.[/center]

[center]If you like it, you can also try my [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30173]Necromancer Amulet Retexture[/url], [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32561]Bones and Skeletons Retexture[/url], [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31731]The Divine Amulets Retexture[/url], [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32396]The Cultists Robes Retexture[/url] and [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32182]The Divine Shrines Retexture[/url].[/center][/size]

[center][color=RED][size=+1]It\'s not free for other\'s Conversion, neither Upload on any other sites.
Do not upload anywhere include Steam workshop without my Permission.[/size][/color][/center]


[center][size=+1]Andrea[/center][/size]
author: Andre7890
